It is unique for its widespread accessibility, ease of use, and its foundational role in popularizing generative AI for the general public, students, and professionals.. tidymodels (ml frameworks) is Collection of R packages for modeling and machine learning using tidyverse principles providing consistent and intuitive interface for the modeling process.. Users choose it for R, Tidyverse, Consistent.

sections.title: Key Features
